alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:27AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusty winds will impact portions of Forest, eastern Vilas, western Florence and northeastern Oneida Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 625 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Watersmeet to 5 miles southeast of Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area to near Newbold. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Tthunderstorms will be near... Eagle River around 635 AM CDT. Phelps around 645 AM CDT. Kentuck Lake Campground around 650 AM CDT. Crandon, Tipler, Wisconsin Slough Natural Area and North Otter Creek Natural Area around 705 AM CDT. Whisker Lake Wilderness around 715 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
